Title: A Good Day to Die
Writer: Tom Kapinos (developed by), Joe Henderson, Chris Rafferty, Mike Costa (story editor), Chris Rafferty (story editor), Neil Gaiman (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo), Sam Kieth (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo), Mike Dringenberg (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo)
Actors: Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro, D.B. Woodside
Plot: Lucifer returns to hell to find an antidote for Chloe and his mother goes to hell to bring him back.
